---
title: useServerSentEvents
---

`useServerSentEvents` (`useSSE` for short) is like `useServerSideQuery`,
but provides real-time data streaming using the `EventSource` standard.

`useSSE` takes a function that returns a `ReadableStream`:

```ts
const { data, dataUpdatedAt } = useServerSentEvents(async (ctx) => {
	await authorizeUser(ctx);
	return new ReadableStream<Date>({
		start(controller) {
			setInterval(() => controller.enqueue(new Date()), 1000);
		},
	});
});
```
